SELECT V_ID AS vid, V_CLI_ADDR AS addr, TO_CHAR(V_START_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "HH" : "MI"') AS startDate , TO_CHAR(V_END_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "HH" : "MI"') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(V_REQ_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "HH" : "MI"') AS reqDate , P_TOTAL - (P_TOTAL * 0.1) AS totalPrice , MEM_NICKNAME AS clientNickname FROM MEMBER M JOIN TMP_MEM TM ON M.TMP_MEMBER_ID = TM.T_MEM_ID JOIN PET_SHARE PS ON TM.T_MEM_ID = PS.TMP_MEMBER_ID JOIN V_PET_CHO VPC ON PS.P_SHA_ID = VPC.P_SHA_ID JOIN V V ON VPC.V_ID = V.V_ID JOIN S_ALLOW SA ON V.S_ALL_ID = SA.S_ALL_ID JOIN S_APPLY S ON SA.S_APP_ID = S.S_APP_ID JOIN V_RESERV VR ON V.V_ID = VR.V_ID JOIN PAY P ON P.P_ID = V.PAYMENT_ID WHERE TM.T_MEM_ID = 'UV8YF0IN08' AND SYSDATE <= V.V_END_DATE AND SYSDATE >= V.V_START_DATE
